deploy.startCommand: bash -lc 'if [ -f app/wsgi.py ]; then exec gunicorn app.wsgi:app --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --workers 2 --worker-class gthread --threads 2 --timeout 120 --log-level debug --capture-output; elif [ -f wsgi.py ]; then exec gunicorn wsgi:app --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --workers 2 --worker-class gthread --threads 2 --timeout 120 --log-level debug --capture-output; else echo "No wsgi file found"; exit 1; fi'
